Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the manifest is operating in read-only or read-write mode.
Docs.value: A value indicating whether the manifest is operating in read-only or read-write mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If you only need to read a manifest, set this flag to `True`. If you need to write a new manifest, set this flag to `False`. The default is `False`. This property provides additional context for the manifest generator, and affects how some error messages are reported.

Docs.summary: Locates all specified assembly and file references.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveFiles() cil managed

Docs.summary: Locates all specified assembly and file references by searching in the same directory as the loaded manifest, or in the current directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The location of each referenced assembly and file is required for hash computation and assembly identity resolution. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveFiles(string[] searchPaths) cil managed

Docs.param: An array of strings specifying the directories to search.
Docs.summary: Locates all specified assembly and file references by searching in the specified directories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The location of each referenced assembly and file is required for hash computation and assembly identity resolution. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

Docs.summary: Returns the manifest name.
Docs.returns: A string indicating the name of the manifest.

Docs.summary: Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly. Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateFileInfo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly. Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateFileInfo(string targetFrameworkVersion) cil managed

Docs.param: The version of the target framework to use. Null if no target framework version. If no target framework version, uses sha256 algorithm.
Docs.summary: Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file, using the specified version of the target framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly. Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity. Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.
